site_name: Mobile Zoo of Southern California Inc

citations.narrative:
There is a moderate accumulation of both fresh and dried urine underneath and splattered on a wall adjacent to the
primary enclosures housing four rabbits. Although the primary enclosures and collection pans were free from excreta, the
areas surrounding the enclosures were not. The facility representative stated those areas have been difficult to access
and the rabbits will be moved to a different location. Areas surrounding primary animal enclosures that are difficult to
access can have accumulations of excreta, which may increase disease hazards to rabbit housing facilities. Premises,
including areas surrounding animal housing enclosures, shall be kept clean in order to facilitate the prescribed husbandry
practices set forth in this subpart.
To be corrected by 9/20/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.56(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is a moderate accumulation of both fresh and dried urine underneath and splattered on a wall adjacent to the 
primary enclosures housing four rabbits. Although the primary enclosures and collection pans were free from excreta, the 
areas surrounding the enclosures were not. The facility representative stated those areas have been difficult to access 
and the rabbits will be moved to a different location. Areas surrounding primary animal enclosures that are difficult to 
access can have accumulations of excreta, which may increase disease hazards to rabbit housing facilities. Premises, 
including areas surrounding animal housing enclosures, shall be kept clean in order to facilitate the prescribed husbandry 
practices set forth in this subpart. 
To be corrected by 9/20/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
